H0.text: Pedigree chart is the model used to show the pattern of traits that are passed from one generation to the next in a family.

H1.text: Dichotomous key is the model used to show the pattern of traits that are passed from one generation to the next in a family.

H2.text: Energy pyramid is the model used to show the pattern of traits that are passed from one generation to the next in a family.

H3.text: A line graph is the model used to show the pattern of traits that are passed from one generation to the next in a family.

A4.text: A pedigree chart is a diagram that shows the occurrence of certain traits through different generations of a family, most commonly for humans, show dogs, and race horses.

A5.text: Pedigrees use a standardized set of symbols, squares represent males and circles represent females.
